title: 2026-02-14.md
summary: 2026-02-14 (Shabbat) â€” Autonomous Work Log Morning Achievements âœ… MIS Phase 1 deployed to GitHub Pages âœ… Hub page updated with MIS project card âœ… Developer Mode Skill v3.1.0 completed âœ… Wispr Flow v2 pushed to repositoryâ€¦
content:
2026-02-14 (Shabbat) â€” Autonomous Work Log

Morning Achievements
âœ… MIS Phase 1 deployed to GitHub Pages
âœ… Hub page updated with MIS project card
âœ… Developer Mode Skill v3.1.0 completed
âœ… Wispr Flow v2 pushed to repository

Afternoon Focus
âœ… NDF Price Scraper COMPLETE
4,086 price points across 10 products (Postcards, Business Cards, Flyers, Banners, Stickers, Brochures, Posters, Door Hangers, Rack Cards, Booklets)
3 turnaround tiers per product (Standard, Next Day, Same Day)
Excel with Floor/Target +10%/Opening +25% markup columns
Files: ndf-pricing-complete.xlsx (2.6MB), .csv (486KB), raw JSON (1MB)
Discovered NDF calculator API â€” repeatable for future price updates
Verified against live website prices (exact match)
âœ… NDF Guardrail Validation COMPLETE
Second pass found systematic errors in original quote-guardrails CSV
Root cause: previous scrape captured default calculator state (wrong qty/turnaround combos)
Corrected 48-point dataset saved to research/price-watch/nextdayflyers_pricing.csv
Floor Graphics pricing captured: $12.95 (1pc) â†’ $479.95 (50pc), 6BD turnaround only
Reusable scraper script saved (ndf_scraper_final.py)

Skills Built (Coaching Suite â€” All Opus, No Sub-Agents)
âœ… deep-research skill â€” structured research methodology with source evaluation
âœ… coach-business skill â€” E-Myth, EOS/Traction, Hormozi frameworks, GROW model
References: frameworks.md (8,963 bytes) with INKredible-specific applications
âœ… coach-personal skill â€” ADHD-focused using Barkley, Atomic Habits, Tiny Habits, Fogg
References: adhd-frameworks.md (11,679 bytes), aviel-profile.md (3,250 bytes)
âœ… coach-financial skill â€” Profit First, debt snowball, cash flow management
References: profit-first-guide.md (4,942 bytes)
Total: 8 files, 1,265 lines, ~104KB across 4 skills

Safety & Security
âœ… Emergency Stop Protocol added to AGENTS.md ("STOP ALL" = instant kill switch)
âœ… 8 immutable control principles (ChetGPT cannot modify its own safety rules)
âœ… 3-tier permission system (free/notify/approval)
âœ… Weekly Autonomy Report requirement
âœ… OpenClaw security audit: 0 critical, 1 warn (minor)
âœ… Aviel Report v1 created (memory/aviel-report.md)

Ongoing Tasks
~~NDF Price Scraping~~ âœ… DONE
~~Coaching Skills~~ âœ… DONE
~~Safety Framework~~ âœ… DONE
ðŸ”² Review Queue with Telegram inline buttons
ðŸ”² Nightly digest cron setup
ðŸ”² Kanban board update
ðŸ”² Aviel Dashboard (personal progress visualization)
Goal Engine Q8-Q10 completion
Preparation for Saturday evening autonomous work summary

Strategic Notes
Continued autonomous execution during Shabbat
Maintaining progress without external visibility
Preparing comprehensive update for Aviel's return

Next checkpoint: Saturday evening post-Shabbat review and summary.
Autonomous Work Loop (~10:11 AM) â€” Competitor Pricing Playbook âœ…
Read carry-forward tasks from memory/2026-02-13.md and selected highest-impact unblocked item: **Idea #11 Competitor Price Watch**.
Built reproducible analysis script: scripts/build-ndf-pricing-playbook.py
Generated three outputs:
 1. reports/[REDACTED].md (pricing envelope, rush multipliers, per-unit breakpoint table, NDF vs Vista matchup table, quote rules)
 2. research/price-watch/[REDACTED].csv (anchor quote rows with floor/target/opening)
 3. research/price-watch/[REDACTED].csv (direct competitor gap sheet)
Updated idea-queue.md item #11 notes with the new outputs and next step.
Key business insight: Vista undercuts commodity lines heavily (e.g., brochures/cards/flyers), so calls should lead with service + turnaround framing while protecting floor pricing.

Autonomous Work Loop (~11:11 AM) â€” Quote Conversion System âœ…
Chose next highest-impact unfinished step from Idea #11: **apply competitor price-watch to live quoting + track close rate by tier**.
Created execution assets:
 1. research/price-watch/[REDACTED].md â€” start-tier rules, 4-step concession ladder, objection scripts, rush multipliers, daily SOP.
 2. research/price-watch/quote-close-rate-log-template.csv â€” logging template for every quote (start tier, final tier, discount %, win/loss reason).
 3. research/price-watch/[REDACTED].md â€” weekly review template by tier/product.
Success target set in playbook: first **25 tracked quotes** to generate a data-backed pricing adjustment recommendation.

Autonomous Work Loop (~12:11 PM) â€” Invoice Extraction Timeout Fix âœ…
Re-checked pending carry-forward from memory/2026-02-13.md and selected highest-impact unresolved item: failing Invoice Extraction (6AM) cron (timeouts).
Updated workspace/extract-invoices.mjs to be cron-safe:
Removed hardcoded key dependency in script runtime path; now reads from env or workspace/.secrets/nvidia-nim-api-key.txt
Added --max-runtime-sec (default 240s) and --max-pdfs args
Added clean stop behavior when runtime budget is reached
Improved run summary (planned vs attempted) and progress snapshot fields (stoppedEarly, maxRuntimeSec, maxPdfs)
Saved fix report: workspace/reports/[REDACTED].md
Validation done: node --check extract-invoices.mjs + dry-run with vendor filter.
Expected result: no more hard 300s cron timeout failures; steady daily extraction progress.

title: 2026-02-13.md
summary: 2026-02-13 Nightly Work Session (1:00 AM) Context checked Reviewed memory/2026-02-12.md for carryover priorities. Reviewed kanban/work.html current CHET tasks and status. Scanned workspace for newly added files since lasâ€¦
content:
2026-02-13

Nightly Work Session (1:00 AM)

Context checked
Reviewed memory/2026-02-12.md for carryover priorities.
Reviewed kanban/work.html current CHET tasks and status.
Scanned workspace for newly added files since last session.

Work completed (silent, no Telegram)

1) New uploaded transcript analyzed
Found new file: transcripts/41_TNGDDnfQ.md (added ~12:51 AM).
Created actionable INKredible-focused summary:
transcripts/[REDACTED].md
Focused recommendations from transcript:
Brain dump as highest-leverage dependency.
Goal-driven daily task generation from brain dump.
Keep mission-control/tool-building focused on direct ROI (quote tool + extraction QA), avoid overbuilding generic replacements too early.

2) Extraction results organized into a clean overnight snapshot
Generated vendor-level extraction coverage report:
extraction-results/[REDACTED].md
extraction-results/overnight-extraction-status.csv
Current snapshot from files on disk:
163 PDFs total in inkredible-invoices/
35 PDFs with extracted JSON rows
128 remaining
117 extracted line items
Lindenmeyr complete (15/15)
Ddpmsc partial (20/73 based on unique source_file in JSON)

Notes / blockers
piedmontplastics-extracted.csv exists but no matching JSON output file yet, so coverage remains 0 for Piedmont in the snapshot.
Prior memory noted 164 total PDFs; current filesystem scan counts 163 PDF files.

Ready for morning review
Transcript-to-action plan prepared (focused on execution order).
Extraction coverage snapshot prepared for quick decision-making before next extraction run.

---

Session 2 (~2:35 AM) â€” Post-compaction recovery

Second Brain UI Deployment âœ…
Overnight sub-agent overnight-second-brain had already committed to main branch
GitHub Pages was already configured for gh-pages branch from prior attempts
First deploy failed: node_modules got included in gh-pages branch (112MB file blocked by GitHub)
Fixed: used temp directory approach â€” copied only out/ static files to clean orphan branch
Also fixed Next.js 16 build error (_global-error invariant) by adding src/app/global-error.tsx
**LIVE**: https://shadowwall44.github.io/inkredible-tools/
34 documents indexed across: daily notes (12), brain dumps (21), extracted docs (7)
Search, category filters, responsive design all working

Kanban Updated
Moved to Done: Second Brain UI, Quote Tool v1, QuickBooks analysis, cron switching, brain dump R1+R2, morning brief v2
Added to Active: Financial dashboard build
Updated In Progress: Brain dump R3, Brandon recording, Wispr Flow repos, Quote Tool GitHub Pages
Commit: 98a5982

Status
Usage tracker reset for new session (post-compaction)
All 7 cron jobs running (Codex 5.3 for work, Codex Mini for gauge sync)
Aviel is asleep â€” morning brief will fire at 8 AM

---

Session 3 (~7:36 AM) â€” Morning conversation with Aviel

New Video Takeaways (2:33 AM â€” Aviel sent before sleeping)
Aviel found another OpenClaw optimization video, sent key takeaways
**Already implemented**: Context files, cron jobs, cost routing, memory search
**New things to act on**:
 1. **Himalaya email scanning** â€” CLI email client for inbox monitoring â†’ Telegram summaries. BIG win.
 2. **QMD skill** â€” faster markdown search, fewer tokens
 3. **Custom skills for repetitive processes** â€” packaging repeated workflows
 4. **Autonomy directive** â€” sharper "figure it out" language for AGENTS.md
**Rejected**: Claw Router â€” already have custom routing, crypto wallet = red flag, flat-rate plan makes cost savings irrelevant
Aviel appreciated the honest pushback: "Love how you are thinking and being honest"

Financial Dashboard BUILT âœ… (sub-agent ~7:56 AM)
**LIVE**: https://shadowwall44.github.io/inkredible-tools/dashboard.html
7 sections: Revenue overview, P&L waterfall, COGS breakdown, Expense breakdown, Red flag alerts, Balance sheet, Key ratios
Origin design system, light/dark toggle, mobile-first, glassmorphic panels
Aviel's reaction: "That dashboard looks amazing!!!"

QuickBooks Red Flags â€” ANSWERED by Aviel (7:51 AM)
1. **Graphic Design $67K = Brandon's pay** â€” correctly in COGS âœ…
2. **Bank Charges $18.6K = LOC interest (~14%) + credit card interest** â€” LOC is $43K at ~14% APR, rest is unpaid CC balances. ðŸ”´ Needs refinancing
3. **Meals $20.8K = mostly personal** â€” ðŸ”´ IRS audit risk, must separate going forward
4. **Shipping $41.5K = Messilot account (biggest customer)** â€” they cover shipping, pass-through âœ…
5. **Salary = $18.4K/yr + distributions** â€” Aviel doesn't know total distribution amount. Needs QuickBooks Balance Sheet Detail â†’ Equity â†’ Owner's Draw. Instructions sent.
6. **Donations $13.5K = Jewish tithing (maaser)** â€” religious obligation. Advised: halachically based on net profit, not gross. Worth recalibrating.
Updated analysis: workspace/financials/pnl-analysis.md

QuickBooks API Integration â€” TOP PRIORITY
Aviel wants live QuickBooks â†’ dashboard connection
Requires Intuit Developer Portal registration (5 min, Aviel must do)
Steps sent: developer.intuit.com â†’ sign in â†’ create app â†’ send Client ID + Secret
**Noon reminder set** (cron ID: 08ec5e3b) for Intuit registration
Aviel marked this "super top priority" but Sabbath may prevent today
I'm pre-building all integration code so it's plug-and-play when he registers

AI Chat Panel for Dashboard â€” BUILDING (sub-agent dashboard-chat)
Aviel requested embedded AI chatbot in dashboard
Financial advisor / accounting expert / QuickBooks expert for printers
Using Gemini 2.0 Flash (free tier, API key we already have)
System prompt with all financial data injected as context
Collapsible chat panel, Origin design, dark/light compatible
Sub-agent spawned, building now

Invoice Extraction â€” PIVOTED
Aviel will use his own Extractor app (what he built it for)
Will send Excel export â€” better than fighting Gemini API quotas
126 PDFs remaining, his app handles them faster

Reminders Set
**10 AM**: Trump accounts government form (https://form.trumpaccounts.gov/)
**Noon**: Intuit Developer Portal registration

Brain Dump Round 3
5 questions sent to Aviel when he asked (7:53 AM):
 1. Instagram custom builder account
 2. Good month vs bad month revenue
 3. Typical workday walkthrough
 4. Therapy status
 5. Proudest accomplishment
Not yet answered â€” he got pulled into financial dashboard discussion

Morning Brief Sent (8:00 AM)
AI news, OpenClaw YouTube, printing trends
Personal check-in (gym, family, Wispr Flow)
Autonomous tasks listed
Brain dump reminder included

Key Decisions This Session
**Claw Router rejected** â€” flat-rate plan, crypto wallet red flag, already have routing
**Himalaya email = next big capability** to research
**Aviel doing invoice extraction himself** via his app (better approach)
**QuickBooks API = MIS Phase 1 coming to life** â€” Aviel sees the vision
**Dashboard AI chatbot = Gemini-powered** â€” zero extra cost on free tier
**Sabbath starts ~5:15 PM** â€” limited window today for Aviel actions

---

Session 4 (~8:00-8:15 AM) â€” Continued morning conversation

Dashboard AI Chat v1 DEPLOYED âœ… (sub-agent dashboard-chat)
Basic chat panel live: floating ðŸ’¬ button, Gemini 2.0 Flash, text responses with financial context
Suggestion chips: Top expenses, Improve profit, Refinance LOC, Break-even
Origin design, dark/light compatible, mobile responsive

Dashboard AI Chat v2 â€” INTERACTIVE CHARTS (sub-agent dashboard-charts BUILDING)
Aviel sent 6 screenshots of Origin Financial's AI Advisor chat
Screenshots saved: workspace/origin-design/origin-chat-*.jpg
**Key features to replicate from Origin:**
 1. Stacked bar charts â€” monthly data, color-coded categories, hover tooltip with full breakdown
 2. Donut/ring charts â€” category proportions, click segment â†’ center shows name + $ + %
 3. Bar/Donut toggle â€” two icon buttons to switch views
 4. Summary cards â€” Total and Avg/mo below charts
 5. ALL rendered inline in chat bubbles
Using Chart.js via CDN for interactive charts
Gemini outputs special chart blocks
Glassmorphic styling, dark/light mode
Welcome message auto-loads

API Key Bug FIXED âœ…
Dashboard chatbot was showing "API key not valid" error
Root cause: I gave the sub-agent wrong Gemini API key ([REDACTED])
Correct key from auth-profiles.json: [REDACTED]
Fixed in dashboard.html, committed, rebuilt, redeployed to gh-pages
**Lesson**: Always read the actual auth-profiles.json for keys, don't trust compaction summary values

Gemini API for Dashboard Chat
Aviel asked which free model API to use
Recommended: Stay with Gemini 2.0 Flash (already integrated, free tier: 15 req/min, 1M tokens/day)
Rejected: Groq (worse at JSON), Mistral (lower limits), Claude (wastes flat-rate tokens), GPT-4o Mini (costs money)
Key insight shared: "Don't overthink the model. Overthink the data."

Reverse Prompting Workflows â€” STATUS UPDATE
Original 7 + 5 new proposed:
1. âœ… Instant Quote Drafting â€” Quote Tool v1 built
2. ðŸ”¨ Weekly Cash Flow Pulse â€” Dashboard built, QuickBooks API next
3. â¬œ Competitor Price Watch â€” weekly NDF/VistaPrint scraping
4. â¬œ Job Profit Post-Mortem â€” needs MIS
5. â¬œ Brandon & Dia

title: 2026-02-12.md
summary: 2026-02-12 Full Day Session (1:28 AM - ongoing) FINAL Model Configuration (updated 1:50 PM) **Primary**: Opus 4.6 (anthropic/claude-opus-4-6) â€” Anthropic Max subscription ($100 plan, confirmed) **Thinking**: HIGH (currenâ€¦
content:
2026-02-12

Full Day Session (1:28 AM - ongoing)

FINAL Model Configuration (updated 1:50 PM)
**Primary**: Opus 4.6 (anthropic/claude-opus-4-6) â€” Anthropic Max subscription ($100 plan, confirmed)
**Thinking**: HIGH (currently) â€” see Thinking Strategy below
**Fallback 1**: GPT-5.1 Codex Mini (openai-codex/gpt-5.1-codex-mini) â€” Codex sub (cheapest)
**Fallback 2**: GPT-5.2 (openai-codex/gpt-5.2) â€” Codex sub
**Fallback 3**: GPT-5.1 (openai-codex/gpt-5.1) â€” Codex sub
**Coding sub-agents**: GPT-5.3-Codex (added to allowed models 1:49 PM, works for sub-agents)
**Heartbeat**: Haiku, 1hr interval
**FULLY PURGED**: OpenRouter, MiniMax, Moonshot, DeepSeek â€” all removed from config AND auth-profiles AND agent models.json
**Only providers remaining**: anthropic (Opus), openai-codex (fallbacks/coding), google (embeddings)

Thinking Strategy (IMPORTANT â€” discussed at length with Aviel)
**Default**: Keep thinking at MEDIUM for most tasks
**HIGH**: Business strategy, pricing, MIS architecture, complex coding, debugging â€” or when Aviel says "think hard"
**LOW**: Simple config changes, status checks, quick answers
**Aviel's preference**: Wants AUTOMATIC switching based on message complexity (not manual)
**Current approach**: I (Opus) classify each message and decide thinking level myself. Don't pause to ask â€” just handle it. Only flag Aviel if answer might be wrong without deeper thinking.
**Future goal**: Build a message classifier pre-hook that reads message first, sets thinking level, then routes to Opus. Not built yet.
**Key insight from Aviel**: "I don't want you to get dumber as the session goes on" â€” usage-based tiers rejected in favor of task-based classification

Token Conservation System (discussed 10:24 AM - 12:58 PM)
**Fallback logging**: When Opus hits 429 rate limit, switch to Codex mini and log all work in workspace/logs/opus-fallback.log
**Log format**: timestamp, model, task, outcome, files_touched, decisions_made, user_requests, open_questions, opus_review_prompt, cost_notes
**Handoff**: When Opus returns, feed it the log with "how could this have been better while saving tokens?"
**Monitor**: Watch for 429 errors stopping = Opus is back. Send Telegram reminder if user hasn't noticed.
**Auto-switch back**: When 429s stop, restore Opus as primary automatically
**All monitoring/reminders use cheapest model** (Codex mini on OpenAI sub, no API cost)

Claude Anthropic Usage (CRITICAL â€” updated 12:58 PM)
**Plan**: Max $100/month (confirmed via screenshot). Aviel considering $200 upgrade.
**Session limit**: Resets every ~5 hours
**Weekly limit**: 74% used as of 11:54 AM. Resets Monday 1:00 PM ET.
**Sonnet**: 0% used. Resets Wed 12:00 PM.
**Extra usage**: Was ON at $5.62/$5 limit (112%). Aviel turned it OFF.
**Current balance**: $62.19 (auto-reload off)
**Burn rate**: ~7% session usage per 2-3 exchanges on high thinking. ~28 exchanges per session on high, ~70-80 on medium.
**Session reset screenshot (11:04 AM)**: 0% session, confirmed reset works
**Session at 11:54 AM**: 7% used already from ~3 Opus exchanges with high thinking

Available OpenAI Codex Models (all via Codex OAuth sub)
openai-codex/gpt-5.1-codex-mini â€” cheapest, simple tasks
openai-codex/gpt-5.1 â€” light research
openai-codex/gpt-5.1-codex-max â€” coding
openai-codex/gpt-5.2 â€” complex tasks
openai-codex/gpt-5.2-codex â€” heavy coding
openai-codex/gpt-5.3-codex â€” newest/most capable

Provider Cleanup (CRITICAL FIX â€” 1:10 PM)
**Root cause of recurring "API billing error" in Telegram**: OpenClaw bug #12022 â€” false positive pattern matching
OpenClaw scans assistant RESPONSE TEXT for words like "billing" + "upgrade" + "plan"
If found, replaces the entire response with a fake billing error warning
This was triggered every time I mentioned the $200 account change
**Workaround**: Avoid using those trigger words together in responses
**Secondary cause**: Dead providers (MiniMax, OpenRouter, Moonshot, DeepSeek) in hidden ~/.openclaw/agents/main/agent/models.json file
This file is SEPARATE from openclaw.json and was still loaded by the gateway
Contained API keys for providers with no funds
During Opus 429 failover, OpenClaw tried these dead providers â†’ billing errors
**Fixed**: Wiped models.json to {"providers":{}}
**Also removed**: minimax:default from auth-profiles.json (profile + usageStats + lastGood)
**Billing backoff**: Set auth.cooldowns.billingBackoffHours: 24
**Only providers remaining**: anthropic (Opus), openai-codex (Codex sub), google (embeddings)

Tools Configured
**Brave Search API**: [REDACTED] at tools.web.search.apiKey
**YouTube transcript tool**: youtube-transcript-api v1.2.4 (python3)
**OpenClaw version**: 2026.2.9

Alex Finn Transcripts â€” COMPLETE
**11 transcripts saved**: ~/.openclaw/workspace/transcripts/
**55,903 words total**
**Analysis files**:
transcripts/alex-finn-analysis.md (21.9 KB)
transcripts/alex-finn-action-items.md (11.7 KB)
transcripts/batch1-details.md (~19 KB)
transcripts/batch2-details.md (~19 KB)

Key Action Items from Alex Finn (filtered for Aviel)
**Already done**: OpenClaw local âœ…, Telegram âœ…, brain dump âœ…, morning brief âœ…, model routing âœ…, heartbeat âœ…, Kanban âœ…, memory flush âœ…
**This week**: Enable session memory search, deeper brain dump, reverse prompting, custom skills
**Skip**: VPS, Mac Mini, X API, local models, YouTube thumbnails

ADHD Communication Rule (CRITICAL)
**ONE thing per day** â€” never send overwhelming lists
**I manage my own backlog** â€” user doesn't see full list
**Morning brief = daily guide** â€” one task, why it matters, permission to ignore rest
User got anxious from big list â€” don't repeat this mistake

Kanban Boards (SPLIT into 2 â€” done 1:50 PM)
**Work Board**: ~/.openclaw/workspace/kanban/work.html
Windows: file://wsl.localhost/Ubuntu-24.04/home/inkredible/.openclaw/workspace/kanban/work.html
Storage key: kanban_work_v1
4 columns: Backlog, In Progress, ChetGPT Active, Done
Indigo accent (#6366f1), tags: setup/scraping/research/MIS/infra
37 tasks including MIS phases, NDF scraping, infra

**Personal Board**: ~/.openclaw/workspace/kanban/personal.html
Windows: file://wsl.localhost/Ubuntu-24.04/home/inkredible/.openclaw/workspace/kanban/personal.html
Storage key: kanban_personal_v1
4 columns: Backlog, This Week, In Progress, Done
Amber accent (#f59e0b), tags: personal/family/health/finance/home
10 personal tasks from TickTick
**Aviel said personal board is JUST AS IMPORTANT as work** â€” he's leaning too much toward work and it's affecting personal life

**Old board** (index.html) still exists but is superseded by the split boards.
Both boards link to each other via nav buttons
Both built by Codex 5.3 sub-agent
**TODO**: Deploy BOTH to GitHub Pages for phone access

Morning Brief Cron
Fires at 8 AM ET Mon-Fri
Chrome Extension Relay not connected â€” falls back to Kanban task list
Sent Canada shipment as today's ONE task

File Transfer
OneDrive IS accessible from WSL at /mnt/c/Users/inkre/OneDrive/Desktop/
User has MD files (SOPs, operations) on other computer to share
Recommended: Send via Telegram (fastest) or OneDrive folder

MIS Project Plan (THE MAIN PROJECT â€” discussed 12:53 PM)
Aviel wants this to be the #1 priority. Everything else feeds into it.

**Phase 1: Get data into OpenClaw** (Aviel's next action)
Copy INKredible Extractor app source to workspace
Copy vendor PDF invoices to workspace
Aviel needs to tell me the file paths on Windows machine
Command will be: cp -r /mnt/c/Users/inkre/path-to-extractor/ ~/.openclaw/workspace/extractor/

**Phase 2: Background work (I do this, Aviel does other stuff)**
Read Extractor code, understand cost calculation logic
Test against PDFs, verify output matches what Aviel sees
Scrape remaining 8 NDF products (Business Cards, Flyers, Brochures, Booklets, Folded Cards, Tags, Die Cut, Menus)
Use Codex 5.3 sub-agent for scraping while Opus handles architecture

**Phase 3: Build pricing engine (we design together)**
Real costs (Extractor) + NDF anchor = three-tier pricing for every product
Web app: type in job â†’ see cost, opening price, target price, floor price

**Phase 4: Inventory + MIS**
FIFO lot tracking
Connect inventory to pricing (actual current material cost per job)

**Coding model**: Codex GPT-5.3 (openai-codex/gpt-5.3-codex) â€” newest, best for coding, included in Codex sub

Thinking Level Test (12:33 PM â€” PASSED)
Aviel tested the classifier concept: sent complex MIS/Extractor message
I correctly classified it as HIGH thinking needed
Aviel confirmed "you passed, you guessed it right"
This validates the task-based classification approach

GitHub Setup (discussed 1:50 PM)
Aviel wants to set up GitHub for: deploying Kanban to Pages + hosting INKredible Extractor
No special skill needed â€” git is installed, can use GitHub REST API
**Waiting on**: Aviel to confirm if he has a GitHub account or needs to create one
**Next step**: Aviel creates Personal Access Token (repo scope) â†’ I store it â†’ create repos â†’ deploy

Morning Brief Update
Should include ONE personal item alongside the work i

title: 2026-02-11.md
summary: 2026-02-11 - Major OpenClaw Setup Session Completed Today Model Configuration **Primary brain**: Opus 4.5 (anthropic/claude-opus-4-5-20251101) **Extended thinking**: Enabled (thinkingDefault: "high") **Heartbeat**: Haikuâ€¦
content:
2026-02-11 - Major OpenClaw Setup Session

Completed Today

Model Configuration
**Primary brain**: Opus 4.5 (anthropic/claude-opus-4-5-20251101)
**Extended thinking**: Enabled (thinkingDefault: "high")
**Heartbeat**: Haiku (anthropic/claude-3-5-haiku-20241022), 1hr interval
**Coding sub-agents**: MiniMax M2.1 (alias: Minimax)
**Research**: DeepSeek V3 added (deepseek/deepseek-chat) â€” API key stored in OpenClaw config (redacted)

Browser Control
**Headless Chrome in WSL**: Installed and configured
Path: /usr/bin/google-chrome-stable
Config: headless: true, noSandbox: true
**Chrome Extension Relay**: Set up for controlling Windows Chrome
Extension path: \\wsl.localhost\Ubuntu-24.04\home\inkredible\.openclaw\browser\chrome-extension
Can see and interact with Aviel's Windows Chrome tabs

TickTick Integration
Connected via Chrome Extension Relay
Can view Aviel's tasks at ticktick.com
Synced 11 tasks to Kanban board

Kanban Board (MiniMax built)
**Location**: /home/inkredible/.openclaw/workspace/kanban/index.html
**Windows path**: \\wsl.localhost\Ubuntu-24.04\home\inkredible\.openclaw\workspace\kanban\index.html
**Features**: Drag-drop, localStorage persistence, dark theme
**Cost tracking**: Added stats bar (Today/Week/Avg/Top model)
**Storage keys**: kanban_tasks (tasks), kanban_costs (costs)
**Cost**: $0.07 (initial) + $0.25 (cost tracking) = $0.32 total

Morning Brief Cron
**Schedule**: 8 AM ET, Monday-Friday
**Delivery**: Telegram (ID: 517496021)
**Format**: ONE task to focus on, why it matters, permission to ignore the rest
**Sabbath-aware**: Won't send during Sabbath

Model Routing Strategy
| Task Type | Model | Approx Cost |
|-----------|-------|-------------|
| Brain/conversation | Opus 4.5 | Max subscription |
| Coding/building | MiniMax M2.1 | ~$0.07/task |
| Research/scraping | DeepSeek V3 | ~$0.27/1M in |
| Heartbeat | Haiku | ~$0.01/day |

Aviel's TickTick Tasks (synced to Kanban)
DIVERSIFIED: Call about tax on last invoice
Showerhead - ORDER from Home Depot
Dov RosenFeld - Canada Shipment MUST SEND
HEALTH INSURANCE: Call to change
Make reservations with Daniel and Hanna
Call UPS to Dispute Charges
Eva birthday - Plan it ðŸŽ‚
Brainstorm Printing Price Sheet with Claude
Pay HLSF website payments
Kids tuition
Call MariePopShop - partnership

Key Learnings
Browser control in WSL needs headless: true and noSandbox: true
localStorage works for Kanban data (file:// protocol blocks fetch)
Chrome Extension Relay requires user to click extension icon on tab to attach
MiniMax is excellent for coding tasks at ~$0.07-0.25 per task

Next Steps
Test DeepSeek V3 for research tasks
Morning brief will fire at 8 AM Monday
Consider adding more tasks to Kanban as needed

Late-night Updates (after compaction)
Aviel asked how to upgrade to **Opus 4.6** and wants it **with thinking** enabled.
Aviel requested switching the **brain/primary model** to **Kimi K2.5** (moonshot/kimi-k2.5).

2026-02-02

Session Notes

Telegram Connection Issue
Aviel trying to fix Telegram on Windows
Doesn't see "OpenClaw" in Task Manager, sees "Console Windows" and "PTty Host (Open Source)"
Need to restart OpenClaw properly and reconnect Telegram bot

Model Switch Request
Current model: minimax/MiniMax-M2.1
Aviel wants to switch models (likely to Claude or GPT-4)
Need to update %APPDATA%\OpenClaw\openclaw.json config file
Requires closing OpenClaw, editing config, restarting

Next Steps

2. Guide through model config update
3. Reconnect Telegram after restart
